casebody.data:
State of Connecticut
v.
Cordaryl Silva Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2016

Glenn W. Falk, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 255, 141 A.3d 916 (2016), is denied.

EVELEIGH, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
